Undulating Pseudopod.name: Undulating Pseudopod
Undulating Pseudopod.flavor: As you flow across the battlefield, a pseudopod briefly forms on your body, reaching out to confound an enemy.
Undulating Pseudopod.effect: You shift your speed. You may make the following attack at any point during this movement.
Undulating Pseudopod.onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Touch of Dissolution.name: Touch of Dissolution
Touch of Dissolution.flavor: With a single touch, your foeâ€™s body dissolves into a protoplasmic form.
keywords: Beast Form, Implement, Polymorph, Primal, Psionic
Touch of Dissolution.onHit: 4d10 + Dexterity or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is blinded and takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends both).
Touch of Dissolution.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).

Amorphous Return.name: Amorphous Return
Amorphous Return.flavor: Nothing can force you into a specific form for long.
Amorphous Return.trigger: You start your turn and are affected by a polymorph effect or an effect that is petrifying you.
Amorphous Return.effect: You end the effect, and you gain 10 temporary hit points.
